description: En- (an intensifying prefix) + chasten (to chastise, subdue, or render chaste).

verbs.description: enchasten (third-person singular simple present enchastens, present participle enchastening, simple past and past participle enchastened)

examples: To hallow and enchasten all the land;
And I am motherhood that cannot sleep,
Without the pressure of a tiny hand.  [â€¦]
